NIL
January '10 - AIJAC trip to Israel. Spouse: NIL. Dependent Children: NIL.

ALP, USU, various registered clubs. Patron of many Hunter-based community and sporting organisation). Quantas Chairman's Lounge, Kris Flyer Elite Silver Membership. National Press Club. ALClub. Spouse: ALP. Dependent Children: ALP

One complimentary mixed case of wine: 2004 Aged Release Semillon, 2010 Show Reserve Verdelho, 2009 Show Reserve Chardonnay, 2007 Limited Release Chardonnay, 2008 Cabernet Merlot, 2009 Show Reserve Merlot, 2009 Charlie Shiraz, 2009 Show Reserve Shiraz (2 bottles), 2006 Limited Release Hunter Valley Shiraz, New Release: Single Vineyard Wines Steven Shiraz (2 bottles)
Wife has disposed of her interests in Eastern Star Gas.
Guest of the Hunter Valley Thoroughbred Breeders on Wednesday 3 August 2011. Accepted return helicopter flight from Rutherford to the Upper Hunter and hospitality.
Residence - Red Hill, Canberra. Purchased by myself and my spouse.
Part of a delegation to NATO headquarters in Brussels from 24-28 March, 2012. Included flights, accommodation, hospitality and transfers.
Accepted complimentary Federal Parliamentary Membership of the National Press Club of Australia.

Guest along with my wife of the Bloomfield Group on Saturday 3 November, 2012 to celebrate their 75th Anniversary in business. Accepted 2 tickets to attend their Black Diamond Ball, 2 wine glasses and a miners lantern.
Received a complimentary bottle of Penfolds Grange Bin 95 - Vintage 1996 from Dr Peter Davies.

Received one complimentary mixed case of wine: 2010 Personal Reserve Shiraz, 2009 Cellar Select Shiraz Hunter Valley, 2004 Hunter Valley Semillon – Bin 9000 (2 bottles), 2006 Hunter Valley Semillon - Bin 9000 (2 bottles)
